alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lamar; Monroe; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 6:34PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Monroe, eastern Upson, Crawford, southeastern Talbot, Taylor and southern Lamar Counties through 700 PM EST... At 634 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Salem to near Howard, and moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Butler, Roberta, Reynolds, Yatesville, Culloden, The Rock, Lincoln Park, Russellville, Howard, Logtown, Salem, Prattsburg, Horns, Wesley Church, Fickling Mill, Charing, Redbone Crossroads, Brent and Musella. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Lamar; Monroe; Talbot; Taylor; Upson
